RE:Sgt.Dude
ALL PEOPLE HAVING THE SAME ISSUE,DO THIS I DID:
RIGHT CLICK ON BOTH .EXE ACPC.EXE AND CONFIGURE.EXE
CLICK ON PROPERTIES
CLICK ON COMPATIBILITY
CHECK RUN ON XP SP3,DISABLE DESKTOP COMPOSITION AND RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR
APPLY CHANGES
CONFIGURE YOUR GRAPHICS ACCORDING TO YOUR CAPABILITIES.IF YOU HAVE DARK SCREEN ON GAME DECREASE ANTIALIASING OR SET IT OFF.
I'M RUNNING WINDOWS 7 ULTIMATE 64 BITS
